## Statistical considerations for the e-WHORM trial design

Simulation study on the design of a randomized, placebo-controlled, double-blind, parallel-group phase-II study to investigate the efficacy and safety of oxfendazole (OXF) in subjects with onchocerciasis, loiasis, mansonellosis and/or soil-transmitted helminth.
